description: Temporary personnel services. Department of National Defence, Canadian Forces Base (CFB) 17 Wing located in Winnipeg, Manitoba. Period of the proposed contract is three (3) years with two (2) additional one (1) year option periods.
duration_in_months: The contract will run for 3 calendar years
full_summary:
## Temporary Kitchen Help Services

### Solicitation Information

* **Title** (English): W0117-22WF01 Temporary Kitchen Help Services
* **Title** (French): W0117-22WF01 Services d’aide temporaire en cuisine
* **Reference Number**: WS4446074735-Doc4601769235
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4446074735

### Tender Details

* **Closing Date and Time**: July 23, 2024, 14:00 EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 15, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 31, 2026
* **Expected Contract Duration**: Three (3) years with two (2) additional one-year option periods

### Service Description

The Department of National Defence, 17 Wing, Canadian Forces Base in Winnipeg, Manitoba requires temporary contract food services support personnel, including:

* Kitchen helpers
* Cleaners
* Contract coordinator

### Procurement Method

This tender is open to all qualified suppliers through competitive bidding.

### Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Regional Opportunities

* This opportunity is restricted to suppliers with a physical presence in Canada. The end-users are located in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Andrew Hemy
* **Contact Email**: andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Ariba Discovery Posting Number**: 19830335

### Attachments and Supporting Documentation

None

### Website and Documentation

Please refer to the Ariba Discovery posting for additional information and documentation. The posting is located at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19830335](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19830335?extsite=MTk4MzAzMzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)External link icon. External link icon.
